title: Welcome to The Weekend Cinema
content:
This is your new simplified blog! 

We have switched to a high-performance JSON database hosted directly on GitHub. This means your site will load instantly for everyone around the world, with no complex setup required.

Enjoy writing!
excerpt: Welcome to your new fast and simple movie blog.
author: System

title: Interstellar: A Masterpiece
content:
Christopher Nolan's Interstellar is not just a movie; it's an experience. from the thundering score by Hans Zimmer to the visual tearing of spacetime, it demands to be seen on the biggest screen possible.

The emotional core of the film, driven by the relationship between Cooper and Murph, anchors the high-concept sci-fi in something deeply human.
excerpt: Looking back at Nolan's sci-fi epic ten years later.
author: Staff Critic
